subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti, who won the Indianapolis 500 and captured the IndyCar Series points championship this season, will switch to Nascar in 2008 and compete for Chip Ganassi Racing.
snippet: Dario Franchitti, who won the Indianapolis 500 and captured the IndyCar Series points championship this season, will switch to Nascar in 2008 and compete for Chip Ganassi Racing.
